title: Spectacular Eid Al Adha packages at Tilal Liwa HotelTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Spectacular Eid Al Adha packages at Tilal Liwa Hotel
Tilal Liwa Hotel, a secluded hideaway leisure resort perched on the edge of Rub Al Khalil Desert in Abu Dhabi’s Empty Quarter, invites residents and guests to make this Eid Al Adha a memorable occasion for your family and loved ones.
Eid is a time to relax and enjoy a spiritual retreat so celebrate this special festivity in a picturesque desert landscape at the majestic Tilal Liwa Hotel with room rates starting from Dhs799 which includes an overnight stay at Tilal Room with desert view, exotic fruit basket on arrival, buffet breakfast, lunch or dinner and complimentary use of extensive recreational facilities.
Families with kids will enjoy fun-filled activities such as kite flying and sand boarding in addition to a wide range of desert activities such as sand boarding, quad biking, horseback riding and more.
The property has also prepared a sumptuous feast to celebrate Eid Ad Adha. Families and friends can indulge in “Seafood Night” on the first day of Eid for Dhs175 featuring the freshest catch of the sea and “Asian Night” on the second day for Dhs150 per person featuring the mouthwatering cuisine from Asia, The Eid promotion is applicable for stays between 22nd to 26th September 2015 only for GCC/UAE nationals and residents. Rate is based on double occupancy and subject to 10% service charge and 6% tourism fee. Children below 6 years will enjoy free meals and 6 years up to 12 years get 50% discount.
